WITH t AS (SELECT odd_id, odd_group_id, odd_parent_id FROM sys_org_dept_dtls)
SELECT id, pid, name, icon, ubd_pass, ubd_expre_date, ubd_use, flag, type,plc_id,plc_name,ubd_nick_name FROM (SELECT odd_id || agd_id id, '' || odd_id pid, odd_id || t.odd_group_id, agd_name name, 'orgs.png' icon, null ubd_pass, null ubd_expre_date, null ubd_use, agd_key flag, '0' type, '' plc_id, null plc_name, null ubd_nick_name FROM t, sys_auth_group_dtls WHERE odd_group_id = agd_parent_id AND agd_type = 1)
INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT odd_parent_id || (odd_group_id) zid from t) z ON z.zid = id
UNION ALL SELECT '' || odd_id id, odd_parent_id || odd_group_id pid, odd_name name, 'org.png' icon, null ubd_pass, null ubd_expre_date, null ubd_use, null flag, '2' type, '' plc_id, null plc_name, null ubd_nick_name FROM sys_org_dept_dtls, sys_auth_group_dtls WHERE odd_group_id = agd_id
UNION ALL SELECT '' || agd_id id, '' pid, agd_name name, 'orgs.png' icon, null ubd_pass, null ubd_expre_date, null ubd_use, agd_key flag, '0' type, '' plc_id, null plc_name, null ubd_nick_name FROM sys_auth_group_dtls WHERE agd_parent_id = -1 AND agd_type = 1 UNION ALL
SELECT '1-' || ubd_id id, '' || ubd_dept_id pid, ubd_name name, 'user.png' icon, ubd_pass, TO_CHAR(ubd_expre_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ubd_expre_date, ubd_use, null flag, '1' type, ''||ubd_plc_id plc_id, pbd_police_name plc_name, ubd_nickname ubd_nick_name FROM sys_user_base_dtls LEFT JOIN plc_police_base_dtls ON pbd_user_id=ubd_plc_id

WITH t AS (SELECT odd_id, odd_group_id, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF flag, odd_parent_id FROM sys_org_dept_dtls START WITH odd_id = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id) SELECT id, pid, name, icon, ubd_pass, ubd_expre_date, ubd_use, flag, type,plc_id,plc_name,ubd_nick_name FROM (SELECT odd_id || agd_id id, '' || odd_id pid, odd_id || t.odd_group_id, agd_name name, 'orgs.png' icon, null ubd_pass, null ubd_expre_date, null ubd_use, agd_key flag, '0' type, '' plc_id, null plc_name, null ubd_nick_name FROM t, sys_auth_group_dtls WHERE odd_group_id = agd_parent_id AND agd_type = 1 AND t.flag = 0) INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT odd_parent_id || (odd_group_id) zid from t) z ON z.zid = id UNION ALL SELECT odd_parent_id || agd_id id, '' pid, agd_name name, 'orgs.png' icon, null ubd_pass, null ubd_expre_date, null ubd_use, agd_key flag, '0' type, '' plc_id, null plc_name, null ubd_nick_name FROM sys_auth_group_dtls
INNER JOIN sys_org_dept_dtls
ON odd_group_id = agd_id WHERE odd_id = ? UNION ALL SELECT '' || odd_id id, odd_parent_id || odd_group_id pid, odd_name name, 'org.png' icon, null ubd_pass, null ubd_expre_date, null ubd_use, null flag, '2' type, '' plc_id, null plc_name, null ubd_nick_name FROM sys_org_dept_dtls, sys_auth_group_dtls WHERE odd_group_id = agd_id START WITH odd_id = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id UNION ALL SELECT '1-' || ubd_id id, '' || ubd_dept_id pid, ubd_name name, 'user.png' icon, ubd_pass, TO_CHAR(ubd_expre_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ubd_expre_date, ubd_use, null flag, '1' type, ''||ubd_plc_id plc_id, pbd_police_name plc_name, ubd_nickname ubd_nick_name FROM sys_user_base_dtls INNER JOIN t ON ubd_cus_number = t.odd_id LEFT JOIN plc_police_base_dtls ON pbd_user_id=ubd_plc_id WHERE ubd_id!=?

INSERT INTO sys_user_base_dtls ( ubd_cus_number, ubd_id, ubd_name, ubd_pass, ubd_expre_date, ubd_dept_id, ubd_use, ubd_admin, ubd_seq, ubd_crte_user_id, ubd_crte_time, ubd_plc_id ) VALUES ( :ubd_cus_number, :id, :name, :ubd_pass, TO_TIMESTAMP(:ubd_expre_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'), :pid, :ubd_use, :ubd_admin, :id, :ubd_crte_user_id, sysdate, :plc_id )

UPDATE sys_user_base_dtls SET ubd_cus_number=:ubd_cus_number, ubd_name =:name, ubd_pass =:ubd_pass, ubd_expre_date =TO_TIMESTAMP(:ubd_expre_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'), ubd_dept_id =:pid, ubd_use =:ubd_use, ubd_admin =:ubd_admin, ubd_updt_user_id =:ubd_updt_user_id, ubd_updt_time =sysdate, ubd_nickname =:ubd_nick_name WHERE ubd_id=:id
SELECT pbd_user_id id, pbd_police_id code, pbd_police_name name FROM plc_police_base_dtls
item.where: WHERE (:name IS NOT NULL OR pbd_police_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',:name),'%'))
WHERE (:code IS NOT NULL OR pbd_police_id LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',:code),'%'))

WITH t AS (SELECT DISTINCT '' || (agd_id) id, agd_name name, agd_parent_id pid, 'true' nocheck, agd_key flag, '0' type, 'roles.png' icon FROM sys_auth_group_dtls WHERE agd_type = 2
AND agd_key !=?
START WITH agd_id = (SELECT (agd_id) FROM sys_auth_group_dtls WHERE agd_key =?) CONNECT BY PRIOR agd_id = agd_parent_id)
START WITH agd_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT (rbd_group_id) FROM sys_role_base_dtls) CONNECT BY agd_id = PRIOR agd_parent_id)
SELECT '1-' || rbd_id id, rbd_name name, rbd_group_id pid, null nocheck, null flag, '1' type, 'role.png' icon FROM sys_role_base_dtls
INNER JOIN t
ON rbd_group_id = t.id
UNION ALL SELECT id, name, pid, nocheck, flag, type, icon FROM t
SELECT urr_role_id id FROM sys_user_role_rltn WHERE urr_user_id=:id

SELECT ubd_id AS userid,ubd_name AS username FROM sys_user_base_dtls
